channel.title: {Cannot see items i drop}
channel.description:
Hey
I am using server Bluescape3, and when i right click - drop something in my inventory it doesnt show up on the ground. Things show up on the ground when i have killed someone in PvP but otherwise no other way. I have no idea where to find how to fix this, ive tried copying codes from other servers but no luck.
Please help.

item.title: {Cannot see items i drop}
item.dc:creator: @archyroof archyroof
item.description:
@archyroof wrote:

No text just nothing appears

Read full topic
